com.ctrlaltelite.pos.models

Class MenuItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ctrlaltelite.pos.models.MenuItem

  • public class MenuItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a MenuItem in the POS system.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MenuItem

        public MenuItem(int menuItemId,
                java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String description,
                double price,
                java.lang.String category,
                java.lang.String status)
        Constructs a new MenuItem with the specified details.
        Parameters:
        menuItemId - the unique identifier of the menu item
        name - the name of the menu item
        description - a brief description of the menu item
        price - the price of the menu item
        category - the category of the menu item ("Entree", "Side", "Drink")
        status - the status of the menu item ("active" or "inactive")
